item.title: win10系统下Rstudio中的乱码问题
item.description:
既往使用mac系统，未曾见过乱码现象。然而，目前工作（同事）主要使用win10系统。

因此，在此记录解决办法，再也不见同类问题。

item.title: Review raw data with ggpairs
item.description:
It’s very necessary to have a look at the data source before trying to analyze it.

In this blog, I will share a powerful function ggpairs to implement the purpose.

item.title: Keyboard Shortcuts for RStudio IDE in Mac
item.description:
In this blog, I will record some useful keyboard shortcuts for RStudio IDE.

Still, complete information is available directly in the RStudio IDE under the Tools menu: Tools -> Keyboard Shortcuts Help.

item.title: Download mRNA lncRNA and miRNA and match clinical information with R from UCSC Xena
item.description:
It’s very convenient to get datasets from UCSC Xena. Normally, datasets will need to be processed and transformed with R language.

Herein, I will recover the protocol of datasets processed.
